headline: Caterpillar Inc. (CAT): A Bull Case Theory
summary: We came across a bullish thesis on Caterpillar Inc. (CAT) on Investing Lawyer’s Substack. In this article, we will summarize the bulls’ thesis on CAT. Caterpillar Inc. (CAT)’s share was trading at $359.80 as of 18th June. CAT’s trailing and forward P/E were 17.55 and 18.94 respectively according to Yahoo Finance. Caterpillar Inc. (CAT), a dominant force […]

headline: Can Deere Sustain Its 5-Year Double-Digit Dividend Growth Streak?
summary: DE's five-year dividend growth of 18.2% and consistent shareholder returns highlight its income strength, even as earnings decline.
